title: グランドライブ、スタート！

text_block_list.name: Light Hello
text_block_list.text: ...Yes, yes. Understood! Please connect the relay to each stage as well.

text_block_list.name: Light Hello
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san. I hear everything is going smoothly and it's a huge success. Now, starting Part 2... and then.

text_block_list.name: Light Hello
text_block_list.text: It will be the debut of 'GIRLS' LEGEND U'.

text_block_list.name: Light Hello
text_block_list.text: Yes. This song will be performed not just on Stage A here, but also on Stage B, Stage C... and other stages simultaneously.

text_block_list.name: Light Hello
text_block_list.text: All the Umamusume will sing together, and we plan to get excited with the fans at the same time.

text_block_list.name: Light Hello
text_block_list.text: Hehe, we had the tech team pool all their strength for this. We'll definitely make it enjoyable.

text_block_list.name: Light Hello
text_block_list.text: For the Umamusume, for the fans. —And for you too!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: The faces of everyone waiting for the show to start, they were all fidgeting, couldn't wait~.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: At this point, there's no room for nerves or anything. We have to work hard not to let down their expectations...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: We won't let them say it's 'ordinary'. We'll make everyone smile with the best live performance!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Transcending spring, summer, fall, and winter, yearning and burning with desire...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: ...Run.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Hehe, this song is interesting, isn't it? Because in the end, it connects to running.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: But that's what makes it so like us Umamusume. I think the lyrics turned out really wonderful!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Alright! Inhale... exhale...

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Let's go, everyone! We'll deliver the song and our feelings with all our might!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Yeah.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Through this live, you will gain power! Expand your own possibilities, enhance the usefulness of your relationships, and overcome even your limits!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Hehe, that goes for you too, Tachyon.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: We can't end yet, it's not over! Let's all sing together! 'GIRLS' LEGEND U'!
All that's left is for 'GIRLS' LEGEND U' to play on stage――
